short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mute new tabs based on user preference.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you have the possibility, to disable or enable the audio for new tabs. You can mute all new tabs in general, non-incognito, incognito or no tabs at all. Changes done via this extension will not mute or unmute existing tabs, only new ones. 

This is a more general setting to the existing functionality where you change the audio on a single tab.

The extension will not collect any data. Only the configuration of the extension itself is saved locally on your machine.
